sentences.text: POTENTIAL PAYMENTS UPON CHANGE IN CONTROL OR TERMINATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not consider post-termination benefits as a material element of executive compensation because NEO post-termination benefits are the same benefits available to all full-time employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Post-termination benefits are not included in the Compensation and Governance Committees analysis of total compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are obligated to make certain payments to employees, including our NEOs, or to accelerate the vesting of their equity awards pursuant to the following plans and agreements:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control Severance Plan that covers all full-time employees, including the NEOs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2002 Stock Incentive Plan, 2011 Equity Incentive Plan and 2014 Equity Incentive Plan that govern all equity awards made to Directors and employees, including the NEOs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in control provisions for the benefit of Messrs. Albi, Bell, and Jorden, as assumed by Cimarex; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supplemental Savings Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our change in control arrangements keep our senior executives focused on pursuing all corporate transaction activity that is in the best interests of shareholders regardless of whether those transactions may result in their own job losses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Uncertainty created by a corporate transaction can create retention risk for a company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, change in control protection is often needed to retain and attract, when appropriate, the best talent because many of the companies with whom we compete for talent provide change in control protection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have a formal program to pay severance benefits nor do our equity award agreements provide for acceleration of equity awards upon the retirement of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are obligated under certain agreements to pay benefits upon a change in control event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cimarexs definition of change in control as used in its 2002 Stock Incentive Plan, its 2011 Equity Incentive Plan and its 2014 Equity Incentive Plan, its Change in Control Severance Plan and the change in control provisions that survived certain expired employment agreements with each NEO are the same.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In summary, a change in control event means any of the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Acquisition of 30% or more of the shares of our outstanding common stock or the combined voting power of voting securities of Cimarex by an individual or group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of our Board of Directors, or Directors nominated by those Directors, cease to constitute a majority of the Directors during any period of twelve months;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A reorganization, share exchange or merger unless
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the shareholders prior to the reorganization or merger continue to own more than 40% of the outstanding common stock and combined voting power of the resulting corporation following the reorganization or merger; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) at least a majority of the members of the Board of the corporation resulting from the merger or reorganization were members of the Board at the time of executing the agreement to reorganize or merge; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The complete liquidation or dissolution of Cimarex or the sale of all or substantially all of its assets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of those agreements that provide for payment to the NEOs in the event of a change in control event coupled with termination of employment without cause:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control  Termination Without Cause
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Change in Control Plan provides for the payment of severance benefits to all active employees in the event of termination following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a change in control, if an employee is terminated for any reason other than cause (as defined in the Plan) within two years following a change in control, that employee would be entitled to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash severance payments of up to two years salary and cash incentive award;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A pro rata portion of the annual cash incentive bonus award otherwise payable for the year of termination; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued medical, dental, disability and life insurance benefits for two years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We assumed from a predecessor company the change in control provisions from the now-expired employment agreements of each of Messrs. Albi, Bell, and Jorden with such company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each agreement provides that if the executive is terminated without cause within two years following a change in control event (as defined in the agreement), the executive is entitled to a lump-sum payment equal to two times the executives base salary at the time of the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits payable under these agreements are forfeited if the executive receives benefits under any other change in control plan, including the Cimarex Change in Control Severance Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a practical matter, the change in control benefits assumed under the employment agreements only benefit these executives if the Change in Control Severance Plan described above has been terminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Change in Control Severance Plan provides for greater benefits payable upon the occurrence of a change in control event than those payable under the assumed agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control  No Termination
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2002 Stock Incentive Plan, our 2011 Equity Incentive Plan, and our 2014 Equity Incentive Plan provide for acceleration of vesting of equity awards in the event of a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits under the Supplemental Savings Plan also are paid upon death or disability.

sentences.text: DIRECTOR AND OFFICER INDEMNIFICATION AGREEMENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into an indemnification agreement with our Directors and certain officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These agreements require us, among other things, to indemnify such persons against certain liabilities that may arise by reason of their status or service as Directors or officers, to advance their expenses incurred as a result of a proceeding for which they may be indemnified, and to cover them under any Directors and officers liability insurance policy that we choose, in our discretion, to maintain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These indemnification agreements are intended to provide indemnification rights to the fullest extent permitted under applicable Delaware law and will be in addition to any other rights that the indemnitee may have under our Restated Certificate of Incorporation, Bylaws, and applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE TO APPROVE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION (ITEM 2)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, 98% of the votes cast were in favor of the advisory vote to approve executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the advisory vote, as part of our regular shareholder engagement, we consider and discuss with shareholders a number of matters throughout the year, including executive compensation and governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Governance Committee carefully considers any feedback and routinely reviews executive compensation practices and governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Governance Committee considered the results of the advisory vote and the discussions with shareholders to convey our shareholders support of the Committees compensation decisions in 2015 and early 2016 and shareholders overall satisfaction with Cimarexs executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this support, the Compensation and Governance Committee retained the core design of our executive compensation programs for the remainder of 2016, as it believes the programs continue to retain, attract, when appropriate, and appropriately incent senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, we again will hold an annual advisory vote to approve executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Governance Committee will continue to consider the results from this years and future advisory votes on executive compensation, as well as feedback from shareholders through the course of such year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because your vote is advisory, it will not be binding upon the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board values shareholders opinions, and the Compensation and Governance Committee will take into account the outcome of the vote when considering future executive compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that shareholders vote FOR the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the shareholders approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of Cimarexs Named Executive Officers, as disclosed in this proxy statement, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the executive compensation tables and the related narrative.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote FOR the advisory vote to approve executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON FREQUENCY OF ADVISORY VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION (ITEM 3)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described in Proposal 2 above, shareholders are being provided the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on Cimarexs executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proposal 3 affords shareholders the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on how often Cimarex should include a say-on-pay vote (described in Proposal 2 above) in its proxy materials for future annual meetings of shareholders (or a special shareholder meeting for which Cimarex must include executive compensation information in the proxy statement for that meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this Proposal 3, shareholders may vote to have the say-on-pay vote every year, every two years, or every three years, or may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because your vote is advisory, it will not be binding upon the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board values shareholders opinions, and the Compensation and Governance Committee will take into account the outcome of the vote when considering frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that an annual advisory vote on executive compensation will permit our shareholders to provide direct input on Cimarexs executive compensation philosophy, policies and practices as disclosed in the proxy statement each year, which is consistent with our efforts to engage in an ongoing dialogue with our shareholders on executive compensation and corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote FOR every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: REPORT OF AUDIT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee on behalf of the Board of Directors monitors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the integrity of the Companys financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the independent auditors qualifications and independence;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the performance of the Companys internal audit function and independent auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the appropriateness of the Companys accounting policies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the adequacy of the Companys internal controls;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) the Companys compliance with legal and regulatory requirements related to audit matters;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) the process related to ongoing litigation matters,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (viii) the annual process of estimating and reporting quantities of oil and gas reserves,  and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ix) risk oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In so doing, it is the responsibility of the Committee to maintain free and open communication between the directors, the independent auditor and the management of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Audit Committee meet the independence, experience and financial literacy requirements of the New York Stock Exchange, the Sarbanes Oxley Act and any rules or regulations promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has adopted a written charter for the Audit Committee, a copy of which is available on our website at www.cimarex.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the Companys financial statements, the financial reporting process, and the process of estimating and reporting quantities of oil and gas reserves, including the related systems of internal controls and disclosure controls and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys independent registered public accounting firm is responsible for performing an independent audit of the Companys financial statements in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards, as well as an audit of the Companys internal control over financial reporting in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) and issuing reports thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees responsibility is to monitor and oversee these processes and the Audit Committee uses the Companys internal audit department and (if applicable) independent petroleum engineers to assist with these responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed Cimarexs audited financial statements and supplemental oil and gas reserve information as of and for the year ended December 31, 2016 and met with management, DeGolyer and MacNaughton (an independent petroleum engineering consulting firm) and KPMG, Cimarexs independent registered public accounting firm, to discuss the related information, and the effectiveness of Cimarexs internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has received from KPMG the communication required by PCAOB Rule 3526, Communication with Audit Committees Concerning Independence, and discussed with KPMG their independence from Cimarex and its management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also discussed with KPMG any matters required by the PCAOB Auditing Standards No. 1301, Communications with Audit Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on these reviews and discussions, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that Cimarexs audited financial statements be included in Cimarexs Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE AUDIT COMMITTEE Monroe W. Robertson, Chairman Harold R. Logan, Jr.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lisa A. Stewart Michael J. Sullivan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Report does not constitute soliciting material and shall not be deemed to be filed or incorporated by reference into any other Cimarex filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, except to the extent that Cimarex specifically incorporates the Audit Committee Report by reference.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF INDEPENDENT AUDITORS (ITEM 4)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board has appointed KPMG LLP to audit our financial statements for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since October 1, 2002, KPMG LLP has served as our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are asking that shareholders ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If shareholders fail to ratify the appointment, the Audit Committee may reconsider this appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A KPMG LLP representative will be at the Annual Meeting to answer appropriate questions and to make a statement if he or she desires.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends a vote FOR the ratification of KPMG LLP as Cimarexs Independent Auditors for 2017.
